content: glove pattern features a braided cable on the front of each glove gloves may be made bob cratchit style without fingertips or with full fingers sized for adults xs - circumference around palm 5 /12 5 cm s - circumference around palm 6 /15 cm m - circumference around palm 7 /17 5 cm l - circumference around palm 8 /20 cm xl - circumference around palm 9 /22 5 cm xxl - circumference around palm 10 /25 cm 1 - 2 skeins fingering weight yarn needle size 2 75 mm u s 2 blog post about these gloves http //dancingtriceratops com/2018/10/24/wip-fall-is-here/
